name: Dissassembly
description:
Dissassembly : Revenge Yourself

When your last girlfriend quit your for nothing in middle of the COVID-19 pandemic

One option left is to REVENGE YOURSELF !

This is an gameboy game (made with GB Studio) based on the true story of myself (the developer) in the past few days and has the goal to revenge myself (yourself in the game). This game contains multiple endings. This can also be considered as the next part of SHYVE.
